(b h : ℝ)
(hbh : b > 0 ∧ h > 0 ∧ b ^ 2 + h ^ 2 = 2 ^ 2)

```lean4
theorem putnam_1986_b1
(b h : ℝ)
(hbh : b > 0 ∧ h > 0 ∧ b ^ 2 + h ^ 2 = 2 ^ 2)
(areaeq : b * h = 0.5 * b * (1 - h / 2))
: h = putnam_1986_b1_solution := by

  have h₁ : b > 0 := hbh.1
  have h₂ : h > 0 := hbh.2.1

-/
theorem putnam_1986_b1
(b h : ℝ)
(hbh : b > 0 ∧ h > 0 ∧ b ^ 2 + h ^ 2 = 2 ^ 2)

: h = putnam_1986_b1_solution :=

(b h : ℝ)
